options.content:
# Kubernetes Scheduler Comparative Analysis Dashboard

This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of scheduler performance, resource utilization, fair resource allocation, and topology awareness in Kubernetes environments. 

**Current test configuration:** $scheduler scheduler | Namespace: $namespace | Time range: $__from to $__to

panels.title: Job Wait Time (Time from Creation to Running)
Job Execution Time (Time from Running to Completion)
Total Job Time (Time from Creation to Completion)

targets.expr: sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace"}) )^2 / (count(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace"}) ) * sum( (sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace"}) )^2 ) )

sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace"}) )^2 / (count(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace"}) ) * sum( (sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace"}) )^2 ) )

sum(sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace"}) )^2 / (count(sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace"}) ) * sum( (sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace"}) )^2 ) )

sum(sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace"}) )^2 / (count(sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace"}) ) * sum( (sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace"}) )^2 ) )

(count(kube_pod_info{namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(node) group_left(label_topology_kubernetes_io_zone) kube_node_labels * on(label_topology_kubernetes_io_zone) group_left() kube_pod_info{namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(node) group_left(label_topology_kubernetes_io_zone) kube_node_labels) / count(kube_pod_info{namespace=~"$namespace"})) * 100

panels.title: Percentage of Pods on Same Node/Zone
